articles.title: Kim Jong Un Enjoys Performance Given by Korean People's Army Song and Dance Ensemble
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Enjoys Performance Given by Korean People's Army Song and Dance Ensemble
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) --  Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and  first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, enjoyed a performance given by the Korean People's Army Song and Dance Ensemble on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					The performers sang high praises of the glorious history of the DPRK in which it has covered the path of glory, winning victories and bringing about changes along the road of independence, Songun and socialism for more than 60 years under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The performance represented the resolution of all service personnel and people to defend dear socialism, the cradle of their happiness, to the last despite any difficulties and trial, deeply aware of the advantages of the benevolent socialist system through their life experience.
					
					 The audience firmly pledged themselves to wage a dynamic drive to build a thriving socialist nation of Juche-type under the leadership of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Among the audience were Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae, Hyon Yong Chol, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Ki Nam, Pak To Chun, Kim Jong Gak, Yang Hyong Sop, Hyon Chol Hae, Kim Won Hong, Kim Yong Il, Kim Yang Gon, Mun Kyong Dok, Ro Tu Chol and officials of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, the Cabinet, ministries and national institutions and Pyongyangites.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun at 00:00 on Sunday, the 64th anniversary of the DPRK, to pay high tribute to Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					 Wrapped in a solemn atmosphere of reverence was the palace, the sacred temple of Juche where lie in state Kim Il Sung, founder of socialist Korea and the glorious DPRK, and Kim Jong Il who put the dignity and power of the country on the highest level with his ever-victorious Songun politics.
					
					 Kim Jong Un was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, Hyon Yong Chol, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Jong Gak, Ri Yong Mu, Pak To Chun, Hyon Chol Hae, Kim Won Hong, O Kuk Ryol and other members of the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the National Defence Commission and staff members of the Supreme Command.
					
					 He entered the hall where statues of the Generalissimos are standing.
					
					 Set up on ether side of the statues were flags of the WPK and the DPRK and military colors. Lining up there were guards of honor of the ground, naval and air and anti-air forces of the KPA and the Worker-Peasant Red Guards.
					
					 The commander of the guards of honor presented a salute to the statues of the Generalissimos.
					
					 A floral basket was laid before the statues in the name of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A floral basket was also laid in the name of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces.
					
					 Kim Jong Un together with the participants paid high tribute to the statues.
					
					 Then he entered the hall where Kim Il Sung lies in state.
					
					  He, together with the participants, made a bow to Kim Il Sung in humblest reverence.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Russian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Russian President
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a message of greeting from V. Putin, president of the Russian Federation, on Sunday, the 64th anniversary of the foundation of the DPRK.
					 The message said:
					
					 Respected Your Excellency Kim Jong Un,
					
					 I extend my heartfelt congratulations to you on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the foundation of the DPRK, the national day.
					
					 The relations between Russia and the DPRK are successfully developing on the basis of the solid tradition of friendship and mutual respect.
					
					 I am convinced that to continue expanding bilateral dialogue and constructive and practical cooperation in various fields is in full line with the interests of our two peoples and will contribute to ensuring the peace and stability in the Korean Peninsula and the whole of Northeast Asia.
					
					 I wish you and the people of the DPRK success, happiness and wellbeing.
					
					 Please accept my respect to you.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Bangladeshi President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Bangladeshi President
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The Bangladeshi President Zillur Rahman sent a message of greeting to the dear respected Kim Jong Un on September 4.
					 The president in the message said that it is pleasure for him to extend warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un and the people of the DPRK in the name of the Bangladeshi people and on his own behalf on the occasion of the auspicious 64th anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 He said he was convinced that the good bilateral relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the interests of the two peoples.
					
					 He wished Kim Jong Un good health and happiness as well as the friendly people of the DPRK peace and prosperity.
					
					 He sent the highest tribute to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Leader of Political Party of Russia
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Leader of Political Party of Russia
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), received a congratulatory message from Gennadi Zyuganov, chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, on September 6.
					 The message said:
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un,
					
					 I extend warm congratulations to you in the name of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and on my own behalf on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK people have strengthened the national defence capabilities by making heroic efforts and built a prosperous socialist society under the leadership of the WPK in all those years.
					
					 Pressure and military provocation moves of the external forces can never deter your country from pursuing domestic and foreign policies for creativity.
					
					 We are sure that the goals set by you will be achieved.
					
					 I wish you new success as well as the Korean people happiness and prosperity.
					
					 Please accept my tribute to you.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Indonesian Party Leaders
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Indonesian Party Leaders 
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), received a message of greetings from Megawati Soekarnoputri, general chairwoman of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle, and Tjahjo Kumolo, its secretary general, on August 30.
					 In the message they extended tribute to Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The message said all the members of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle extend greetings to Kim Jong Un, congratulating him on the occasion of September 9, 2012, the 64th anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 The message sincerely wished Kim Jong Un good health for the happiness and prosperity of the Korean nation, convinced that the Korean people would build a prosperous powerful nation under his leadership.
					
					 Availing themselves of the opportunity, they hoped that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle and the WPK would grow stronger in the future.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Raul Castro
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Raul Castro
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, and Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Sunday received a message of greeting from Raul Castro Ruz, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba.
					 The message extended warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un and Kim Yong Nam, the WPK and the government and people of the DPRK on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the DPRK in the name of the Communist Party of Cuba and the government and people of Cuba.
					
					 It expressed the will to boost fraternal relations between the two countries.
					
					 It sent comradely salutes to them.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Sri Lankan President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Sri Lankan President 
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory message from Mahinda Rajapaksa, president of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka, on September 5.
					 The message extended warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un and the government and people of the DPRK in the name of Sri Lankan government and people on the occasion of the auspicious anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 It expressed conviction that the genuine relations between the two countries would steadily develop in the future.
					
					 Availing himself of the opportunity, the president in the message sincerely wished Kim Jong Un happiness as well as the people of the DPRK steady progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Belarusian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Belarusian President
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, received a congratulatory message on Sunday from Belarus President Aleksandr Lukashenko.
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend sincere congratulations to you and people of your country in the name of the Belarusian people and on my own behalf on the anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 I am sure that the relations of the two countries will successfully expand and develop in the interests of the two peoples in the future.
					
					 I wish you and your family good health and happiness and the Korean people prosperity and well-being.
					
					 Please accept my highest respects to you.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Pakistani President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Pakistani President
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory message from Pakistani President Asif Ali Zardari on Sept. 7.
					 The president in the message said that it is pleasure for him to extend warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un in the name of the Pakistani government and people on the significant occasion of Sept. 9, 2012, 64th anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 The two countries established mutually beneficial relations of cooperation in all fields, he noted.
					
					 He expressed hope for further development of the relations.
					
					 Availing himself of the opportunity, he wished Kim Jong Un good health as well as the people of the DPRK prosperity.
					
					 He extended the highest respects to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Organizations of Chongryon
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Organizations of Chongryon
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received congratulatory messages and letters from the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and organizations under it on the 64th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 They included the Standing Council of the Korean Federation of Workers in Commerce in Japan, Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, Central Standing Management Board of the Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan, Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Teachers and School Clerks in Japan, Central Standing Council of the Union of Korean Central Educational Association in Japan, Central Standing Council of the Korean Social Scientists Association in Japan, Standing Council of the Standing Council of the Korean Amateur Athletes Federation in Japan, Central Standing Council of the Korean Medical Association in Japan, Central Standing Committee of the Korean Students Union in Japan, Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, the Central Standing Council of the Korean Human Rights Federation in Japan and other central organizations of Chongryon and 
					
					 organizations under it.
					
					 They also included such enterprises as the Choson Sinbo Company, Korean News Service, Hagu Bookshop, Kumgang-san Opera Troupe, Tonghae Ltd., Korean Goods Sales Company, Committee for Promoting Korea-Japan Economic Exchange, Federation of Joint Economic Venture of Korean Residents in Japan, Center for Consulting Marriage of Korean Youth in Japan, Korean Publishing House as well as each local headquarters of Chongryon, Joson University and Korean schools at all levels in Japan.
					
					 The messages and letters paid highest respects to President Kim Il Sung who founded the DPRK and to leader Kim Jong Il who turned it into a powerful socialist country and extended the highest glory and warmest congratulations to Marshal Kim Jong Un who sent a historic congratulatory message to the Conference of the Officials of Chongryon Chapters despite pressure of work, on the 64th anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 The messages and letters said they were greatly encouraged by sacred image of Kim Jong Un who beat back the imperialists' tenacious moves to stifle the DPRK with the might of Songun, true to the cause of the preceding leaders, and who is wisely leading the country along the road of prosperity and the officials of Chongryon and Korean residents in Japan only to victory and glory.
					
					 They said the foundation of the DPRK was a historic event that made the Koreans in Japan, who had lived in sorrow as members of a stateless nation, dignified and proud overseas citizens of the DPRK.
					
					 The officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan are renewing their will to turn out in the drive of setting an example of patriotic movement for a new heyday in order to advance the movement of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan straight along the road of Juche and patriotism, they added.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Cambodian King
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Cambodian King
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory message from Cambodian King Norodom Sihamoni on Sep. 3.
					 In the message the king extended the warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un on the anniversary of the DPRK in the name of the Cambodian people and on his own behalf, and sincerely wished Kim Jong Un good health and happiness and greater success in the historic cause of leading the Korean people.
					
					 He said Kim Jong Un is the most dignified successor to Generalissimos President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He praised Kim Jong Un as the greatest leader who is guiding the people, country and the army of the DPRK to the rosy future of peace, development and prosperity.
					
					 He expressed satisfaction over the steady development of the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation which make the two countries and peoples get united at all times.
					
					 He extended the highest respects to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from AINDF
articles.content:
Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from AINDF
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory letter from the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) on Sunday, the 64th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 In the letter the AINDF Central Committee extended high tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who performed the undying feats for building and strengthening the DPRK, reflecting the boundless reverence of the vanguard fighters and patriotic people in south Korea.
					
					 The letter extended the highest glory and warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un who is bringing earlier the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche started on Mt. Paektu, holding high the banner of Songun.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The foundation of the DPRK by Kim Il Sung was a great event which opened a new origin for building the state centered on the people on the basis of the Juche idea. As a result, our fellow countrymen could advance straight along the road of victory and glory with the powerful weapon for hewing out the destiny of the nation and achieving the prosperity of all generations to come.
					
					 The DPRK is shining brightly as eternal Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's Korea thanks to Kim Jong Un, who is making the history of this land the one of the Generalissimos with his noble moral obligation.
					
					 The vanguard fighters of the AINDF will consolidate the organization into the vanguard of devotedly defending the sun and that of human bombs and bullets working for reunification, upholding Kim Jong Un as the pillar of their destiny with one mind of loyalty with which they followed the Generalissimos.
					
					 We will mercilessly shatter the dishonest rackets of the group of traitors to slander, defile and encroach upon the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 We will more dynamically wage all-people actions to wipe out the pro-U.S., pro-Japanese traitors and the conservative ruling forces standing against the nation and reunification and thus certainly open up a broad horizon of independence, democracy and reunification.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) sent a congratulatory message to the dear respected Kim Jong Un on Sunday, the 64th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The message said the DPRK that President Kim Il Sung founded and leader Kim Jong Il led to prosperity is the precious embrace of the mother which guarantees the dignity of Chongryon and genuine life of Koreans in Japan and a beacon of their happiness and hope.
					
					 Thanks to the President, who liberated the country through a protracted hard-fought anti-Japanese armed struggle, the Koreans in Japan could become honorable overseas members of an independent sovereign state and set a worldwide model in the overseas Koreans' movement, firmly rallied around Chongryon, said the message.
					
					 Kim Jong Il reared the officials of Chongryon to be genuine comrades during the period of harsh trial, helped the body get more firm unity and resolutely rejected the reactionaries inside and outside Japan in the name of the DPRK and on international arena. Thanks to it, the Koreans in Japan could stand ordeals and firmly safeguard and develop Chongryon.
					
					 The benevolent image of Kim Jong Un deeply impressed the Koreans in Japan and his historic speech at the party celebrating the 52nd anniversary of Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership helped them know well about his courage, pluck, faith and will as a great person of Mt. Paektu, said the message.
					
					 The Koreans in Japan will hold great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in high esteem forever as the sun of the nation and bring a new heyday of the movement of the Koreans in Japan, true to the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Koreans in Japan will firmly defend the socialist country in step with the people in the country, make tangible contributions to building a thriving nation and wage vigorous external activities for hastening the national reunification and improving the DPRK-Japan relations, it noted.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Sends Greetings to Tajik President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Sends Greetings to Tajik President
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greeting to Tajik President Emomali Rahmon on Sunday on the occasion of its national day.
					 He wished the president success in his work and the Tajik people wealth and prosperity.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Indonesian President's Birthday
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Indonesian President's Birthday
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message to Indonesian President Doctor Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono on Sunday, congratulating him on his 63rd birthday.
					 Kim sincerely wished the president good health and happiness in the future, too and greater success in his responsible work for the country's prosperity.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations and Delegates Arrive
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations and Delegates Arrive
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Foreign delegations and delegates arrived here on Saturday to take part in the 8th Pyongyang international scientific and technological book exhibition.
					 Among them were a delegation of press officials of Jilin Province of China, a delegation of the library of Yanbian University of China, a delegation of the Beijing Foreign Languages University of China, a delegation of the Liaoning Provincial Association for International Friendly Contact, a delegation of the Architectural Society of China, a delegation of the Russkiy Mir Foundation of Russia, a delegation of the Choson Exchange Association in Singapore, a delegation of the Pugwash Conference on Science and World Affairs and a delegation of the Society for Book Donation of Koreans in U.S.
					
					  Arriving here earlier were a delegation of the Association for Promotion of Development of Chinese Culture, a delegation of the Environmental Education Media Project and a delegate of the Goethe Research Institute of Germany. 
					
					 Meanwhile, a delegation of the Hyogo Prefectural Citizens Council for Japan-DPRK Friendship led by Secretary General Satoshi Sukita arrived here on the same day.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations, Delegates Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations, Delegates Visit Mangyongdae
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Delegations and delegates of Juche idea study organizations of different countries visited Mangyongdae, birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The guests looked round the historical relics, being briefed on the revolutionary career and feats of the President.
					
					 Anatoli Dolgachev, head of the delegation of the Far Eastern Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of Russia, said:
					
					 Every time I visited Mangyongdae, I was deeply impressed.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, who founded the Juche idea, was the great leader of not only the Korean people but the world people.
					
					 The feats performed by the President, a peerlessly great man recognized by the world, will shine long.
					
					 Rohekele Andre, vice-chairman of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Democratic Congo, said that the bright rays of Juche will shine all over the world, promoting the cause of global independence.
					
					 The guests also toured the Museum of Arms and Equipment of the Korean People's Army, the National Gift Exhibition and other places.

articles.title: Banquet Given in DPRK to Celebrate Its 64th Anniversary
articles.content:
Banquet Given in DPRK to Celebrate Its 64th Anniversary
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- A banquet was given at the People's Palace of Culture on Sunday to mark the 64th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Present there were senior party, state and army officials including Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim and Choe Ryong Hae, the chairperson of a friendly party, deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, unconverted long-term prisoners and merited persons.
					
					 Also present there were the group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the 64th anniversary of the DPRK led by Ko Tok U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, overseas compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys, representatives of international bodies and members of the military attaches corps here and their spouses and other foreign guests here.
					
					 A speech was made by Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
					
					 He said the founding of the DPRK by President Kim Il Sung was a significant event that heralded the birth of a genuine country of people for the first time in the history of the Korean nation spanning 5 000 years.
					
					 Under the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il the DPRK has registered victories in more than 60 years of its history, strikingly demonstrating its dignity and might as a powerful and invincible politico-ideological power and a world-level military power, he noted, adding:
					
					 All the service personnel and people are making dynamic efforts to glorify the DPRK as an eternal country of the sun, the great Paektusan power, under the wise guidance of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un by thoroughly embodying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.
					
					 Only victory and glory are in store for the DPRK advancing under the immortal banners bearing the smiling images of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Art Performances Mark DPRK Anniversary
articles.content:
Art Performances Mark DPRK Anniversary 
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Art performances were given in Pyongyang and provinces on the occasion of the 64th birthday of the DPRK.
					 The revolutionary opera "The Flower Girl" was staged at Pyongyang Grand Theatre.
					
					 It helped the audience keenly realize the undying feats performed by the peerlessly great persons who put an end to the miserable history of the nation by arousing the oppressed and maltreated people and built an invincible socialist power, a country dignified with Songun and powerful with independence.
					
					 At People's Theatre the audience enjoyed the performance given by the National Symphony Orchestra.
					
					 The orchestra made the truthful portrayal of the boundless reverence of the people for the great Generalissimos in orchestral music "Song Devoted to Marshal Kim Il Sung", "Thunder over Jong Il Peak" and symphonic suite "O Korea, I Will Add Glory to Thee", an immortal classic masterpiece, and other numbers.
					
					 The artistes of the symphony orchestra of Yun I Sang Music Institute put on the stage various songs associated with the dignity and pride of the Korean people. They included orchestral music "We Live in the Embrace of the Leader", female low-pitched solo "The Party Is Our Mother".
					
					 The performance of light comedy "An Echo among the Hills" was given at the National Theatre.
					
					 The performers of the art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League presented female solo "Golden Cushion", men's guitar ensemble "Campfire, Flare Up", agitation and mixed chorus "Fly High, Our Party Flag" and other numbers at the plaza of the Arch of Triumph, exciting the audience.
					
					 Acrobats of Pyongyang Circus Theatre and Pothonggang Circus Theatre gave pleasure to people on the national day with such numbers as physical acrobatics "Flying Girls" and "Horizontal Bar and Swing", acrobatics on the ice "Young Persons on the Ice-rink", comedy acrobatics "Punishment" and animal stunt "Dogs Passing Rings".
					
					 Art performances were also given in various places including North Hamgyong, Kangwon and North Phyongan Provinces.

articles.title: Senor Party and State Officials Pay Respects to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Senor Party and State Officials Pay Respects to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials including Kim Yong Nam and Choe Yong Rim, the chairperson of a friendly party and officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Sunday, the 64th anniversary of the DPRK, to pay respects to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Set up on ether side of their statues were flags of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the DPRK and military colors. Guards of honor of the ground, naval and air and anti-air forces of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the Worker-Peasant Red Guards lined up there.
					
					 Seen before the statues was a floral basket sent by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission (NDC) and supreme commander of the KPA.
					
					 There was also a floral basket in the name of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces.
					
					 A floral basket was laid there in the joint name of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK, the DPRK NDC and the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet of the DPRK.
					
					 The participants paid respects to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, who led the DPRK to the road of independence, Songun and socialism, holding aloft the banner of the Juche idea to turn it into an invincible political, ideological and military power.

articles.title: Wreath Laid before Martyrs' Cemeteries
articles.content:
Wreath Laid before Martyrs' Cemeteries
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong and the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery and floral baskets before the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Memorial Tower on Sunday, the 64th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Seen at the wreath-laying stands of the cemeteries were wreaths sent by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Guards of honor of the KPA lined up at the cemeteries and tower.
					
					 Present at the wreath and floral basket-laying ceremonies were senior party, state and army officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 Wreaths were placed before the cemeteries in the name of the WPK Central Committee, the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and the DPRK Cabinet. A floral basket was placed before the main theme sculpture "Victory" of the tower in the joint name of the Central Committee and Central Military Commission of the WPK.
					
					 Laid before the cemeteries and tower were wreaths, floral baskets and bouquets in the name of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, working people's organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, scientific, educational, public health and media organs and party and power organs in Pyongyang.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence to the memory of the martyrs who dedicated themselves to the struggle for the country's liberation, people's freedom and happiness and the DPRK's prosperity under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They expressed deep respect for the servicepersons of the heroic KPA who achieved historic victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War and honorably defended the sovereignty of the country and gains of the revolution.
					
					 They looked round the cemeteries and tower. 
					
					 On the same day wreaths were placed before the statues of martyrs, cemeteries, monuments to the fallen fighters of the KPA and graves of martyrs across the DPRK.

articles.title: Art Performance Given by Mansudae Art Troupe on DPRK Anniversary
articles.content:
Art Performance Given by Mansudae Art Troupe on DPRK Anniversary
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- A music and dance performance was given by the Mansudae Art Troupe at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Sunday, the 64th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Enjoying the performance were senior party, state and army officials including Kim Yong Nam, the chairperson of a friendly party, deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and working people in the city.
					
					 Also present there were overseas compatriots including the members of the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys, representatives of international bodies, members of the military attaches and their spouses and other foreign guests here.
					
					 The performance started with chorus "Song of the Proclamation of the People's Republic" and "My Country Is the Eternal Country of the Leader".
					
					 Put on the stage were colorful numbers including female vocal trio "Embrace of Country", immortal classic masterpiece, dance "Azalea of Homeland", female instrumental ensemble "We Long for You, General" and male solo and female pangchang (off-stage song) "On Rough Roads and High Hills of This Country".
					
					 The performers highly lauded the feats Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed by laying an eternal foundation for the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Male solo "Our Society Is the Best", mixed vocal quintet and chorus "Let's Love Our Homeland" and other numbers impressively featured the Korean people advancing towards the brilliant morrow, enjoying a worthwhile life under the care of the motherland. 
					
					 When mixed duet and chorus "Our Beloved Leader" and female solo and chorus "Ardent Wishes" rung out, the audience hardly repressed their boundless gratitude for the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, who is taking care of all the service personnel and people by embracing them with his warm loving care.
					
					 The performance ended with chorus "Forward to Final Victory".
					
					 It was highly applauded by the audience for its high ideological value and artistry.

articles.title: Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il by Foreign Guests
articles.content:
Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il by Foreign Guests and Overseas Compatriots
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests and overseas compatriots Sunday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill to pay homage on the 64th anniversary of the DPRK. 
					 They included Kanji Inoki, president of the Inoki Genom Joint Co., Ltd. of Japan, and his party, a congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan led by Ko Tok U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, and a Korean in Russia Jong Il Sim.
					
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statues in boundless reverence for the peerlessly great men and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Cambodian King, Great King Send Large Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassy
articles.content:
Cambodian King, Great King Send Large Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassy 
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Cambodian King Norodom Sihamoni and Great King Norodom Sihanouk sent large floral baskets to the DPRK embassy in Phnom Penh on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Upon authorization of the king, a delegation of the Ministry of Royal Palace of the Cambodian government headed by Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister for the Royal Palace, visited the DPRK embassy on September 5 and laid floral baskets before portraits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A congratulatory message to the dear respected Kim Jong Un from the king was conveyed to the DPRK ambassador by the deputy prime minister.
					
					 Kong Sam Ol wished Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the cause of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il good health and happiness as well as the Korean people, close friends of the Cambodian people, greater success in building a thriving nation under his wise leadership.

articles.title: Youth, Students in DPRK Hold Dancing Parties
articles.content:
Youth, Students in DPRK Hold Dancing Parties
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Youth and students across the DPRK held dancing parties Sunday in celebration of the 64th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The dancing venues in Pyongyang included the plazas of the Arch of Triumph, Party Founding Memorial Tower and the April 25 House of Culture. They were full of youth and students who gathered to celebrate the auspicious day with great pride and self-confidence of opening the new era of prosperity under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The dancing parties began with the song "My Country Is the Eternal Country of the Leader". Songs like "Fly Our Tricolor National Flag of the Republic" and "My Country Is So Nice" helped them recollect with deep emotion the President's feats in founding the country.
					
					 They danced to the tune of songs "Let's Sing of General Dear to People"ï¼Œ "Our Father Marshal Kim Jong Il" and others with respect for the Generalissimo Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The atmosphere was elated as "The Pride of Youth", "Campfire, Flare Up", "Break through the Cutting Edge", "Let Us Meet at the Front" and other songs full of spirit of youth blared.
					
					 The dancers showed their pride of leading a worthwhile life in the socialist country led by Marshal Kim Jong Un as members of vanguard and shock brigade in building a thriving nation, dancing to the tune of such songs as "Our Beloved Leader" and "Socialism Is Ours".
					
					 The dancing parties reflected the warm admiration of the young people for Marshal Kim Jong Un, who got them to splendidly enjoy the first Youth Day in another 100-years of Juche era and put them forward as a scouting party of the revolution.
					
					 Similar events were held at several places across the country including Sinuiju, Wonsan and Hamhung.

articles.title: Floral Basket Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Basket Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets were laid before statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the 64th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Servicepersons, people from all walks of life, school youth and children and overseas Koreans visited their statues on Mansu hill in boundless reverence for the peerlessly great men.
					
					 Seen before the statues was a floral basket sent by Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Floral baskets, bouquets and flowers were laid before them in the name of party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, scientific, educational, literature and arts, public health and media organizations and industrial establishments, farms and schools in Pyongyang.
					
					 The participants paid tribute to them.
					
					 Floral basket were also placed before the statues of the great men of Mt. Paektu at the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, Mansudae Art Studio, Kim Il Sung University, Ministry of People's Security, Pyongyang Students and Children's Palace and other places of Pyongyang.
					
					 People including servicepersons and children in all parts of the country also visited statues of the President in their residential areas to pay respects.

articles.title: Southwestern Front Command Warns Enemies in Press Release
articles.content:
Southwestern Front Command Warns Enemies in Press Release
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The southwestern front command of the Korean People's Army released the following press release Sunday:
					 A touch-and-go situation is prevailing in the southwestern front.
					
					 This is attributable to the south Korean military warmongers who have constantly committed reckless military provocations.
					
					 Defying the DPRK's warnings, warships of the south Korean navy have intruded into the territorial waters of the DPRK almost every day. The provocative firing in waters near five islands in the West Sea, including Paekryong, Taechong and Yonphyong, is gravely threatening the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 Flotillas of the south Korean navy will reportedly hold naval bombardment and air force squadrons will stage air attack in waters close to Yonphyong and Taechong from early in the morning to late at night from September 10 to 14.
					
					 This reminds one of a puppy unafraid of a tiger.
					
					 The gravity of the situation is that the south Korean warmongers commit military provocations at the tacit connivance of their American master and with the help of the U.S. aggression troops who go under the name of the "UN command".
					
					 The provokers should clearly know that the southwestern command of the KPA has already been placed on high alert for a war.
					
					 The officers and men under the front are renewing their pledge to turn the West Sea of Korea into the final grave of the provokers true to the order given by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un on August 17 while inspecting the island defence detachments in the southernmost part of the front, if the enemies fire even a bullet into the inviolable territory and waters of the DPRK where its sovereignty is exercised.
					
					 All the units and sub-units of the front have taken posture for prompt launch of a decisive battle in line with the operational plan personally examined and ratified by the supreme commander.
					
					 What remains now is the final order for a great war for national reunification.
					
					 "Answer provocation with prompt counter-attack and aggression war with great war for national reunification!" -- this is the principled stand of the army and people of the DPRK and an unshakable will declared by the supreme commander in public.
					
					 It reflects his warm love for his army and people and bitter hatred for provokers.
					
					 If the enemies show even a sign of move, all the units and sub-units under the southwestern front will deal the enemies bitterer defeat than the Yonphyong shelling by displaying the tremendous might of the Korean People's Army that has inherited the tradition of Mt. Paektu, in hearty response to his call.

articles.title: People's Revolutionary Government Established in Guerrilla Zone
articles.content:
People's Revolutionary Government Established in Guerrilla Zone
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- On the anniversary of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (September 9), its people are recollecting the feats President Kim Il Sung performed for building the people's revolutionary government during the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					 In the early 1930s, the Soviet enthusiasm swept the guerrilla zones in East Manchuria. Their inhabitants were complaining about the Soviet policy pursued in the zones.
					
					 Out of judgment that the Soviet line was inappropriate to the Koreans, Kim Il Sung pondered over a new line to solve the issue of political power.
					
					 He came to a conclusion that what the popular masses wanted was to do farming in their own land and make their sons and daughters study free of charge and that what the practice of the Korean revolution required was to closely rally all Koreans standing against the Japanese imperialist aggressors.
					
					 Then he decided to establish a people's power meeting such demands in the guerrilla zones and call it the people's revolutionary government.
					
					 In line with his new line, the people's revolutionary government, the first of its kind in the country, appeared and expanded in all guerrilla zones.
					
					 The DPRK was founded on the basis of this line.

articles.title: DPRK Turns to Be Socialist Power
articles.content:
DPRK Turns to Be Socialist Power
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- September 9 is the 64th anniversary of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 President Kim Il Sung founded the DPRK on September 9, Juche 37 (1948) and developed it into a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence, guided by the Juche idea.
					
					 Thanks to the illustrious guidance of Kim Jong Il, who devoted himself to glorifying the President's nation-building feats, the DPRK witnessed a heyday of its development.
					
					 On the basis of the revolutionary outlook on the leader, Kim Jong Il took to a new road of building a socialist state and turned the DPRK into a state working to implement Kim Il Sung's idea and cause.
					
					 He had the constitution revised to stipulate that Kim Il Sung is the eternal President of the DPRK.
					
					 And he steadily strengthened the DPRK government into a powerful political weapon for ensuring the Songun (military-first) politics of the Workers' Party of Korea in all aspects.
					
					 He formulated the Songun politics as the basic mode of politics under socialism in keeping with the country's situation and the requirement of the developing revolution in the 1990s.
					
					 His Songun politics turned the DPRK into a politico-ideological power in which the party, the army and the people are united as one in mind and purpose and into a world-level military power with invincible military muscle and nuclear deterrent.
					
					 Eye-catching successes were registered in space, nuclear fusion, CNC and other scientific and technological fields and a lot of edifices built throughout the country.
					
					 Inter-Korean relations gained momentum under the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the DPRK's international prestige ran higher.
					
					 The feats, performed by Kim Jong Il to put the national dignity and strength on the highest level under the banner of Songun, will remain forever along with prospering Songun Korea.

articles.title: DPRK Flag Associated with Kim Il Sung's Undying Feat
articles.content:
DPRK Flag Associated with Kim Il Sung's Undying Feat
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Sixty-four years have passed since President Kim Il Sung founded the Democratic People's Republic of Korea on September 9, Juche 37 (1948).
					 On this anniversary, the DPRK people are looking back upon the feat performed by the President for the national flag.
					
					 On November 18, 1947 when the building of a new country was at its height, he suggested adopting the national flag at the 3rd Session of North Korean People's Assembly and acquainted himself with its design early in February of the next year.
					
					 He indicated the orientation and ways for establishing the DPRK flag, stating that it should clearly represent the national identity in its form and content. And he personally proposed its design.
					
					 Under his meticulous guidance the DPRK flag was instituted at the DPRK Constitution adopted on September 8, 1948.
					
					 The national flag of the DPRK consists of a central red panel, bordered both above and below by a narrow white stripe and a broad blue stripe. The central red panel bears, in the hoist, a five-pointed red star within a white circle. The ratio of the width to the length is 1:2.
					
					 The five-pointed red star of the flag symbolizes the brilliant revolutionary traditions, established by President Kim Il Sung during the anti-Japanese armed struggle, and the rosy future of the country.
					
					 The red stripe represents the Korean people's indomitable fighting spirit and socialist patriotism and the invincible might of their single-minded unity.
					
					 The white circle and the two white stripes represent the identity of the Korean people as a homogenous nation with a long history and brilliant culture and their patriotic stamina. And the two blue stripes in the outermost parts of the flag mean the Korean people's desire for peace and friendship with the world people.

articles.title: DPRK, Patriotic Heritage of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il: Papers
articles.content:
DPRK, Patriotic Heritage of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il: Papers
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Papers here Sunday editorially mark the 64th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Rodong Sinmun says it was thanks to the foundation of the DPRK on Sept. 9, 1948 that it could emerge as an independent and sovereign state in the international arena, providing a power-backed guarantee for life, destiny and prosperity of Korean people for all ages.
					
					 The DPRK is a lifetime legacy bequeathed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il out of patriotism, the paper notes, and goes on:
					
					 The President founded the DPRK and blazed a trail of building a socialist state for decades, performing undying feats to be shining long in the history of the country.
					
					 His Juche-oriented idea and line of nation-building turned the DPRK into a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence, and his seasoned and tested leadership ushered in a new history of world-startling changes unknown in the nation's history.
					
					 It was steadfast will of Kim Jong Il to glorify the DPRK as a dignified thriving socialist nation, true to the patriotic cause of the President.
					
					 The destiny of the socialist country has been firmly protected and a solid foundation laid for building a thriving nation thanks to the indomitable Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It is iron will of the dear respected Kim Jong Un to glorify the DPRK in the world, remaining loyal to the cause of building a rich and powerful country pioneered and advanced by the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Minju Joson says that the socialist country is the most valuable legacy bequeathed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il out of patriotism, stressing the DPRK is demonstrating its might as a socialist power of Juche with invincible might under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces Park Chung-Hee's Pro-Japanese Treachery
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces Park Chung-Hee's Pro-Japanese Treachery 
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- A Manchurian paper issued in 1939 was recently found at the library of the Japanese Diet.  
					 According to it, traitor Park Chung-Hee of south Korea wrote in his own blood an oath of loyalty to Japan and submitted it together with a letter in a bid to join in the puppet Manchurian army as an officer. 
					
					 The oath said "Park Chung-Hee will remain loyal at one death". In his letter he even called Japan his "homeland", taking an oath to be "faithful to it at the risk of life."
					
					 This disclosed the despicable true colors of the "yusin" dictator as a traitor who had been engaged in pro-Japanese acts of treachery, kowtowing to Japanese imperialism, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in a bylined commentary.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 There were not a few pro-Japanese lackeys in the period of the Japanese colonial rule over Korea but never has there been such a heinous and disgusting traitor as Park who had been hell-bent on pro-Japanese acts of treachery by writing even an oath in blood.
					
					 This thrice-cursed traitor ruled south Korea for 18 odd years, indeed a tragedy of history and a shame to the nation.
					
					 What arouses serious concerns is a shocking attempt now taking shape in south Korea to whitewash the pro-Japanese acts of traitor Park and his "yusin" dictatorship. 
					
					 This act of distorting the history and painting traitorous act as a patriotic one is an intolerable mockery and blasphemy to the Korean people who were once trampled down by Japanese imperialism and to lots of south Korean people who fell down shedding blood by the "yusin" dictatorship.
					
					 The descendents of "yusin" are zealously praising traitor Park Chung-Hee. Its purpose is to highlight his "feats of industrialization" and prolong the conservative regime.
					
					 The crimes of yusin "dictatorship" should be punished through generations and the south Korean "Saenuri Party", intent on realizing its ambition for staying in power by covering the dictator's crimes, will never be able to escape the severe public punishment.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Calls for Reinstatement of Campaigners
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Calls for Reinstatement of Campaigners
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The Pusan branch of the Teachers Union of south Korea issued a statement on Sep. 5 calling for the reinstatement of teachers who participated in the campaign for the declaration on the situation.
					 Shortly ago, the Supreme Court ruled that it was unjust to dismiss the teachers who took part in the above-said campaign to condemn the unpopular policy of the present "government", the statement said.
					
					 It slammed the educational authorities for punishing participants in the campaign, branding it as a fascist act of violating the freedom of expression by abusing power.
					
					 Noting that numerous punished teachers are suffering from pains for being separated from their beloved students, it urged the authorities to make an apology for it and reinstate them.

articles.title: South Koreans Stage Surprise Demo against Jeju Naval Base Construction
articles.content:
South Koreans Stage Surprise Demo against Jeju Naval Base Construction
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kangjong villagers in Jeju Island of south Korea and peace activists staged a surprise demo against the Jeju naval base construction on Sept. 6.
					 They climbed a 40-meter high place in Hwasun Port of Soguipho City where they put up a placard reading "Stop the Jeju naval base construction polluting nature and breaking peace". There they disclosed and censured the crimes of the puppet government authorities, opposing the naval base construction which threatens peace and pollutes the natural environment.
					
					 Much upset by it, the authorities went on the rampage to check the demo by mobilizing even a crane but the demonstrators doggedly stood against it.
					
					 That day the police took away by force all of them.

articles.title: Chongryon Hosts Reception to Mark DPRK Anniversary
articles.content:
Chongryon Hosts Reception to Mark DPRK Anniversary
						
 Tokyo, September 8 (KNS-KCNA) -- The Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) hosted a reception at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on September 7 on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Present there were Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, its vice-chairmen, the chairman of the Central Audit Committee of Chongryon, department directors, chairmen of Chongryon headquarters in Kanto area, officials of organizations and enterprises of Chongryon and Korean businessmen.
					
					 Present there on invitation were Japanese personages, ambassadors of different countries and representatives of international organizations in Tokyo and foreign correspondents.
					
					 Ho Jong Man said in his speech that the people in the homeland are pushing forward the general advance for building a thriving nation under the wise leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un. They celebrated the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung as a grand festival of the century after turning big sorrow over the unexpected loss of leader Kim Jong Il into thousand-fold strength and courage, he added.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is providing energetic field guidance to turn the DPRK into not only a political and military power but a knowledge-based economic power based on the latest science and technology that advances along the road of independence, Songun and socialism opened by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, and makes its people fully enjoy wealth and prosperity, Ho said.
					
					 Condemning the U.S. and the south Korean authorities for creating the touch-and-go situation in the Korean Peninsula, ho urged the U.S. to clearly face up to the situation, repeal its hostile policy toward the DPRK, the policy going against the times, and opt for ensuring peace in the peninsula.
					
					 Ho demanded the Japanese government lift the unreasonable sanctions against the DPRK and seek improving the DPRK-Japan relations with the 10th anniversary of the DPRK-Japan Pyongyang Declaration as a momentum.
					
					 He expressed expectation that different countries would as ever extend full support to the Koreans in Japan in their efforts to defend their rights.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Nigerian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Nigerian Paper
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian paper Nigerian Observer on August 31 carried the detailed gist of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People".
					 The work, made public on April 20, 2012 clarifies the revolutionary exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in their lifetimes. It also indicates the tasks for firmly upholding and eternally glorifying their ideas and feats.

articles.title: DPRK Anniversary Marked Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK Anniversary Marked Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Romania, Bulgaria, Switzerland and Laos between August 30 and September 3 to mark the 64th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Displayed in the venues of the meetings were photos of the undying feats President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed in founding and strengthening the DPRK.
					
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, said that over the past 64 years the DPRK has defended the socialist cause and fully demonstrated its dignity and might. 
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The DPRK is dynamically advancing along the road of socialism, working world-startling miracles which would be unthinkable apart from the undying Songun revolutionary leadership of the peerlessly great men.
					
					 Progressive mankind is boundlessly revering Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and holding them in high esteem as the eternal leaders of the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence.
					
					 The acting chief of Kim Il Sung Library in Sofia, Bulgaria said Kim Il Sung built the socialist power in which the principle of independence in politics, self-sustenance in the economy and self-reliance in national defence has been fully applied, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Il pursued the Songun politics, turning the DPRK into a political, ideological and military power.
					
					 The Korean people are working miracles and innovations in building an economic power under the wise leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, who is standing in the van of the party, state and army.
					
					 Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, said that the Korean people led by Kim Jong Un will deal  mercilessly deadly sledge-hammer blows to the provokers and reunify the country without fail.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings in Bulgaria and Switzerland.

articles.title: DPRK Anniversary Marked by Indian, Bangladesh Papers
articles.content:
DPRK Anniversary Marked by Indian, Bangladesh Papers 
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Papers of India and Bangladesh carried special write-ups on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The Indian paper Defence and Humanity on Sept. 2 carried articles under the headline "On the occasion of 64th anniversary of DPRK" with a portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 In the article titled "Country strong in independence", the paper said it is just the DPRK which is consistently maintaining the principle of independence in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliance in national defence.
					
					 Kim Il Sung set forth the anti-imperialist, anti-feudal democratic revolutionary line suited to the specific conditions of Korea and carried out the socialist revolution and construction in keeping with the demand of the Korean people and the specific conditions of Korea, it noted.
					
					 The line of Songun politics advanced by Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il is a thorough-going independent line which helps creditably defend the sovereignty and dignity of the country by its own efforts, it stressed.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un is standing in the van of the DPRK, it said, adding he solemnly declared that the DPRK will invariably advance along the road of independence, Songun and socialism.
					
					 The DPRK will shine long as a country strong in independence, it concluded.
					
					 The Indian paper New Delhi Times on Sept. 1 carried a special write-up with a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung.
					
					 In the article titled "Leader Kim Jong Il's heritage" the paper said that he left as heritage the great feats guaranteeing the eternal foundation of socialist Korea and its rosy future.
					
					 A Bangladeshi paper on Sept. 3 carried articles titled "President Kim Il Sung's feats for nation-building", "Marshal Kim Jong Un, sun of the world" and "Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism".

articles.title: DPRK Is Impregnable Socialist Fortress: Peruvian Organization
articles.content:
DPRK Is Impregnable Socialist Fortress: Peruvian Organization
						
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism released a statement on Sept. 3 on the occasion of the foundation of the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung founded the DPRK on September 9, 1948. This was a historic event which laid a foundation for building an original socialist state centered on the popular masses and developing the DPRK into a country of Juche.
					
					 It was thanks to the Songun politics pursued by leader Kim Jong Il that the Korean people could invariably maintain the socialist principle against the imperialist allied forces.
					
					 Witnessing the might of Songun Korea, the world has come to know better that, though small in territory, this country is an invincible political, ideological and military power.
					
					 The DPRK is an impregnable socialist fortress.
					
					 We are convinced that the Korean people would achieve the final victory in building a thriving nation under the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un as desired by Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un rinde tributo postumo a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un rinde tributo postumo a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
						
Pyongyang, 9 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito a la hora 0 del dia 9 el Palacio del Sol de Kumsusan junto con los miembros de la Comision Militar Central del PTC y el Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC e integrantes del mando de operaciones de la Comandancia Suprema del EPC en ocasion del 64o aniversario de la fundacion de la RPDC y les rindio postumo homenaje a los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					Estaba envuelto de sublime ambiente el citado Palacio, lugar supremo del Juche donde se encuentran los cuerpos del generalisimo Kim Il Sung, creador de la Corea socialista y fundador de la gloriosa RPDC, y del generalisimo Kim Jong Il quien llevo al puesto cimero la dignidad del pais y el poderio estatal practicando la invencible politica de Songun.
					
					Le acompanaron en la ocasion Choe Ryong Hae, Hyon Yong Chol, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Jong Gak, Ri Yong Mu, Pak To Chun, Hyon Chol Hae, Kim Won Hong, O Kuk Ryol y otros miembros de la CMC del PTC y el CDN e integrantes de mando de operaciones de la Comandancia Suprema.
					
					El Mariscal entro en el hall donde se hallaban las estatuas de pie de los Generalisimos.
					
					A ambos lados, estaban puestas las banderas del PTC y la RPDC y estandartes y alineada la guaria de honor de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas del EPC y del Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino.
					
					El jefe de la guardia honor hizo parte de acogida hacia las estatuas de pie.
					
					Fue colocado alli un cesto de flores en nombre del Mariscal.
					
					A continuacion quedo depositado el otro en nombre del Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares.
					
					El Mariscal, junto con los participantes, expreso postumo homenaje hacia ellos. Luego entro en el hall donde se encuentra el cuerpo del Generalisimo Kim Il Sung y le rindio tributo con sublime sentimiento de veneracion.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Putin
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Putin
						
Pyongyang, 9 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que con motivo del 64o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea le dedicara el dia 9 Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, presidente de la Federacion Rusa.
					La misiva sigue:
					
					Su Excelencia estimado Kim Jong Un,
					
					Hago llegarle mi sincera felicitacion a Vd. con motivo del 64o aniversario de la fundacion de la RPDC.
					
					Las relaciones entre Rusia y la RPDC se desarrollan con exito a base de la firme tradicion de amistad y respeto mutuo.
					
					Estoy convencido de que el dialogo bilateral y la ampliacion incesante de la cooperacion constructiva y practica en varias esferas convendran totalmente a los intereses de los pueblos de nuestros dos paises y contribuiran a asegurar la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto de la region del Noreste Asiatico.
					
					Le deseo a Vd. y al pueblo de la RPDC exitos, la felicidad y el bienestar.
					
					Reciba el testimonio de alta consideracion.
